skill.description: Design and generate complete social media playbooks (scripts, visuals, captions, hooks, thumbnails, transitions) for Synthex clients across YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Shorts/Reels. Use when planning multi-platform campaigns or content systems.

skill.author: CleanExpo

security_audit.summary: This skill contains only documentation with no executable code. It describes a social media playbook generation system without any network calls, file system access beyond its directory, or code execution capabilities. The skill appears to be a legitimate marketing tool for content creation.

content.user_title: Generate Social Media Playbooks for Multi-Platform Campaigns
content.value_statement: Stop struggling with social media content planning. This skill creates complete playbooks with scripts, visuals, and posting schedules for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook in minutes.
actual_capabilities: Creates platform-specific content variations (YT, TikTok, IG, LinkedIn, FB)
Designs thumbnail concepts with text overlays
Plans weekly posting schedules with optimal time windows
Structures content for database storage and automation
limitations: Requires existing marketing/offer documentation for context
Does not create actual video files or graphics
Content must align with Synthex brand tone (practical, no hype)
Focuses on trades, agencies, and small businesses

use_cases.title: Onboard new clients with content plans
use_cases.description: Generate complete 30-day social media strategies for new clients across all major platforms in under 10 minutes.

use_cases.title: Launch products with viral potential
use_cases.description: Create platform-specific content that maximizes reach for product launches without expensive agencies.

use_cases.title: Scale content across platforms
use_cases.description: Turn one video idea into optimized content for YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and LinkedIn automatically.

prompt_templates.title: New Client Playbook
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a social media playbook for a plumbing company targeting homeowners. Focus on emergency services, maintenance tips, and seasonal promotions. Include 20 video ideas with hooks, scripts, and thumbnail concepts.

prompt_templates.title: Product Launch Campaign
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a 6-week social media campaign for launching a new AI scheduling feature. Create content for LinkedIn thought leadership, YouTube tutorials, and TikTok behind-the-scenes content.

prompt_templates.title: Educational Series
prompt_templates.prompt: Develop a 30-day educational content series for a business consultant teaching small business owners about cash flow management. Include platform-specific variations for each post.

prompt_templates.title: Seasonal Promotion
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a comprehensive social media playbook for a local retail store's Black Friday campaign. Include countdown content, product showcases, and last-minute deals across all platforms.

output_examples.input: Create a social media playbook for a digital marketing agency targeting e-commerce brands
output: Campaign Overview: Authority-building campaign for e-commerce brands
Primary Persona: E-commerce store owners ($100k-$1M revenue)
Platform Strategy: YouTube (long-form tutorials), LinkedIn (thought leadership), TikTok (quick tips)
Video Concepts: 15 ideas including '3 Facebook Ad Mistakes Costing You Sales', 'How to Scale from $10k to $100k Months', 'The $5 Product that Increased AOV by 40%'
Posting Schedule: 5 videos/week (Mon-Fri) at 9 AM EST for LinkedIn, 3 PM for YouTube, 7 PM for TikTok
Thumbnail Style: Bright colors, large text overlays, shocked expressions, before/after comparisons

best_practices: Always specify your target audience and industry for more relevant content ideas
Include your unique value proposition to differentiate from competitors
Review and customize the generated hooks to match your authentic voice
anti_patterns: Don't use generic prompts like 'make me viral content' - be specific about your goals
Avoid copying competitor content exactly - use ideas as inspiration only
Don't schedule all content at once - leave room for trending topics and news

faq.question: Which platforms does this skill support?
faq.answer: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram (Reels + carousels), LinkedIn, and Facebook. Each platform gets optimized content variations.

faq.question: How many content ideas will I get?
faq.answer: Each playbook generates 10-30 video/post concepts with platform-specific variations, hooks, scripts, and thumbnails.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my existing tools?
faq.answer: Yes, content is structured for database storage and can connect to scheduling tools like Buffer, Hootsuite, or custom APIs.

faq.question: Is my client data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only uses information you provide and doesn't store or transmit data externally. All processing happens locally.

faq.question: What if the content doesn't match my brand?
faq.answer: Each playbook includes brand tone guidelines and can be customized. Review and adjust hooks to match your voice.

faq.question: How does this compare to hiring an agency?
faq.answer: Get agency-quality strategy in minutes instead of weeks, at a fraction of the cost, with unlimited revisions.
